players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I am innocent and need your help to find the mafia."
Bob: "I am the detective and found Diana to be the mafioso"
Bob: "I have identified Diana as the mafioso. I will continue to investigate and protect the villagers."
You: "I am innocent and need your help to find the mafia. I believe Charlie's death was not my doing, and I'm willing to cooperate with anyone who can provide evidence against the mafioso."
